title: 95/588/EC: Council Decision of 22 December 1995 authorizing the Portuguese Republic to extend until 7 March 1996 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 22 December 1995
authorizing the Portuguese  Republic to extend until 7 March 1996 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic  of South Africa
(95/588/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The Portuguese Republic is hereby authorized to extend until 7 March  1996 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa which entered into  force on 9 April 1979.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1995.
For the Council
The President
L. ATIENZA SERNA
(1) OJ No L 142, 7. 6. 1994, p.  31.
